description: This file defines a Retrofit API service interface 'ApiService' for a weather application. It declares REST endpoints to fetch current weather data, weather forecast, location search, and reverse geocoding functionalities, linking to corresponding FastAPI routes.

classes.name: ApiService
classes.description: Interface defining REST API endpoints for weather data, including current weather, forecast, location search, and reverse geocoding.

methods.name: getCurrentWeather
methods.description: Suspending function to retrieve current weather data from 'weather/current' endpoint, with optional query parameters for city, latitude, and longitude.

methods.name: getForecast
methods.description: Suspending function to fetch weather forecast from 'weather/forecast' endpoint, with optional parameters for location and number of days.

methods.name: searchLocations
methods.description: Suspending function to perform location search via 'location/search' endpoint using a query string.

methods.name: reverseGeocode
methods.description: Suspending function to perform reverse geocoding using 'location/reverse' endpoint with latitude and longitude.
